Welcome to Biodesign C, CXFEL Labs

Welcome to the Biodesign C documentation!

This is the main landing page for our documentation. Please choose the project you are interested in, or use the search bar to find what you are looking for:

Note

Each button will take you to the documentation of the project you choose. If you want to go back to this page, click on the “CXFEL Labs GitPages Docs” logo on the top left corner of the page.

Access CXLS Docs Access CXFEL Docs

About This Documentation

This documentation is designed to provide a comprehensive guide for users and developers working with CXLS and CXFEL projects. It is regularly updated to reflect the latest changes and features.
